text: What is the purpose of using an RDS Standby Replica?

answers.text: RDS Standby Replicas don't exist. Only Read Replicas exist.
It provides high availability. RDS will automatically failover to the standby if the primary DB instance goes offline.
A Standby Replica services read-only traffic so its purpose is to scale read operations and performance.
It's a backup of the database created asynchronously. It needs to be restored into the primary AZ in order to be used.
